channel.title: Horizon | new server | 24/7 | great staff | amazing
channel.description:
HORIZON - NEW SERVER!
We are a new server, looking to become big, but we need your help.
Come and get involved, we have something for everyone.
Skilling - Teleports Monsters - Training and Bosses - With drops Working Dungeoneering PK'ing /Dual Arena and Fun PK Active Staff Much MORE!
Come and get involved, we need your help, we do not disappoint!
rswebclients.com/play/Horizon
say slayerbrew sent u
